name: Stay by the Fire
description:
Stay by the Fire is a game about keeping a fire going by sending out Critters to gather wood. Your Critters passively regenerate their energy when they're near the fire. Clicking on the Critter icons at the bottom will send them out to get wood for the fire. Clicking on the fire when you have wood in your storage will boost the fire's health up


This game was made in 3 days and may receive the occasional update. Hopefully you enjoy! :D

Known Bugs

  • critters still search even when at 0 energy.
